template.name: deploy
template.content:
@echo off rem /** rem * Copyright (c) 2013-Now http://jeesite.com All rights reserved. rem * No deletion without permission, or be held responsible to law. rem * rem * Author: ThinkGem@163.com rem */ echo. echo [信息] 部署工程到Maven服务器。 echo.
%~d0 cd %~dp0
call mvn -v echo.
cd .. call mvn clean deploy -Dmaven.test.skip=true -Pdeploy
cd bin pause
